metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16939 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description:
The XFRM dump policy implementation in net/xfrm/xfrm_user.c in the Linuxkernel before 4.13.11 allows local users to gain privileges or cause adenial of service (use-after-free) via a crafted SO_RCVBUF setsockoptsystem call in conjunction with XFRM_MSG_GETPOLICY Netlink messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-137.186
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-137.186
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-103.126~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1054-aws - 4.4.0-1005.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1059-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
